summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Economic Development Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on March 4, 2024, at 1:00 PM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via videoconference, allowing public participation.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the February 5, 2024, meeting.
2. Updates on the City of Dallas Economic Development Corporation.
3. Monthly technology and metrics report from Development Services.
4. Discussion on an amendment to a loan agreement with Saleh Group Properties No 2 LLC.
5. Proposed amendments to the City’s Economic Development Incentive Policy.
6. Awards related to the South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund - Human Development NOFA.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include significant presentations and discussions regarding the economic development strategies and policies impacting the city. The proposed amendments to the Economic Development Incentive Policy aim to enhance the city’s ability to attract and retain businesses. The South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund will also be highlighted, focusing on funding for human development initiatives.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the meeting minutes and will discuss the proposed amendments to the loan agreement and economic development policy. Decisions regarding the allocation of funds from the South Dallas Fair Park Opportunity Fund will also be made. The meeting may enter executive session to discuss sensitive matters related to economic negotiations and legal advice.
